long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect rewards and have live interactions with anybody on the same website as you.  

With just one click, you can instantly connect to the multiplayer internet and turn your online experience into a gamified adventure. 
Use it as a lightweight way to have fun with friends, chat with people interested in the same things as you, and express yourself by crafting cute cosmetics for your character. 

Its perfect for when you're between heads down working and AFK. For those times when you're bored of doomscrolling or just feeling a bit lonely and want to interact with people.

It works on all your favorite sites too: 

- Hang out with friends while watching Youtube together
- Go shopping on Etsy and share opinions with other shoppers
- Compete against other viewers during a livestream on Twitch
- In the moment discussions with people reading the same blog post

As you browse you’ll also have the chance to find rare chests. These chests contain unique cosmetics, emotes, and pets to flex while in multiplayer mode.
Based on the sites you spend the most time on, you'll collect resources that unlock your ability to craft widgets and customize your own Moonbounce home 
(imagine it like a club penguin igloo x myspace page)

Start using Moonbounce now to hangout with friends, meet new people, and get rewards for doing what you’re already doing - everywhere you want on the internet.
